title: Google Pixel 2 - Post Update - Flash on, Phone Frozen, Switched off no longer turns on? Nothing-dead
content:
Hi, team & anyone.

Bought pixel just over 2 years ago.

My phone updated recently, I was using my phone at nighttime - flash light to find something in my room. Light's the other side of the room.

Anyways - I noticed my phone had frozen with flashlight on, screen froze everything froze.
A few seconds later the screen flashed Black/Greenish colors across the screen.
The phone switched off.

Hasn't come back on within 2 days.

Doesn't show any signs of life, no charging lights or icons.
No vibrations.
Doesn't call when I use another line in case it's the screen.

I've tried holding various buttons down, to reboot, nothing.
Even put it in rice - but I haven't been out of the house in 2 weeks... so nowhere near water. 

Rather frustrated. 
Covid - lockdown, lost my job, no income, now a broken phone just outside warranty.

Any ideas?

Thanks for all your help.
Stay safe ^_^
